item.title: Deep Dives - Maker DAO
item.description: Maker DAO is a well-known protocol that has been a pioneer in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space. In 2021, Maker Foundation took a significant step towards decentralization by dissolving itself and spinning up a DAO. As someone who has delved deep into the inner workings of Maker DAO over the past two weeks, I’ve gathered valuable insights and resources that will help anyone start contributing to Maker DAO. Major Events
